summary: The module implements utilities for exporting automatic speech recognition predictions in CTM (time‑aligned) format. It defines a lightweight container for representing a CTM segment (start frame and duration) and a writer that, after each inference batch, converts token sequences into time‑stamped words and persists them as CTM files.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use mechanism for generating time‑aligned transcription files, facilitating downstream analysis, evaluation, and integration of ASR outputs into speech analytics, diarization, and reporting workflows.
